original: Milindapañha
analyzed: milindapañha

original: Meṇḍakapañha
analyzed: meṇḍakapañha

original: Sabbaññutañāṇavagga
analyzed: sabbaññuta ñāṇa vagga

original: 2. Dhammavinayapaṭicchannāpaṭicchannapañha
analyzed: dhamma vinaya paṭicchanna apaṭicchanna pañha

original: “Bhante nāgasena, bhāsitampetaṁ bhagavatā—
analyzed: bhante nāgasena bhāsitam petam bhagavatā

original: ‘tathāgatappavedito, bhikkhave, dhammavinayo vivaṭo virocati no paṭicchanno’ti.
analyzed: tathāgata ppaveditaḥ bhikkhave dhamma vinayaḥ vivaṭaḥ virocati no paṭicchannaḥ ti

original: Puna ca pātimokkhuddeso kevalañca vinayapiṭakaṁ pihitaṁ paṭicchannaṁ.
analyzed: puna ca pātimokkha uddeso kevalam ca vinaya piṭakam pihitam paṭicchanna

original: Yadi, bhante nāgasena, jinasāsane yuttaṁ vā pattaṁ vā samayaṁ labhetha, vinayapaṇṇatti vivaṭā sobheyya.
analyzed: yadi bhante nāgasena jina sāsane yuttam vā pattam vā samayam labhetha vinaya paṇṇatti vivaṭā sobheyya

original: Kena kāraṇena?
analyzed: kena kāraṇena

original: Kevalaṁ tattha sikkhā saṁyamo niyamo sīlaguṇaācārapaṇṇatti attharaso dhammaraso vimuttiraso.
analyzed: kevalam tattha sikkhā sayamaḥ niyamaḥ sīla guṇa ācāra paṇṇatti attha rasaḥ dhamma rasaḥ vimutti rasaḥ

original: Yadi, bhante nāgasena, bhagavatā bhaṇitaṁ—
analyzed: yadi bhante nāgasena bhagavatā bhaṇita

original: ‘tathāgatappavedito, bhikkhave, dhammavinayo vivaṭo virocati no paṭicchanno’ti, tena hi ‘pātimokkhuddeso kevalañca vinayapiṭakaṁ pihitaṁ paṭicchannan’ti yaṁ vacanaṁ, taṁ micchā.
analyzed: tathāgata ppaveditaḥ bhikkhave dhamma vinayaḥ vivaṭaḥ virocati no paṭicchannaḥ ti tena hi pātimokkha uddeso kevalam ca vinaya piṭakam pihitam paṭicchannam ti yam tam micchā

original: Yadi pātimokkhuddeso kevalañca vinayapiṭakaṁ pihitaṁ paṭicchannaṁ, tena hi ‘tathāgatappavedito, bhikkhave, dhammavinayo vivaṭo virocati no paṭicchanno’ti tampi vacanaṁ micchā.
analyzed: yadi kevalam ca vinaya piṭakam pihitam tena hi tathāgata ppaveditaḥ bhikkhave dhamma vinayaḥ vivaṭaḥ virocati no paṭicchannaḥ ti tat pi vacanam micchā

original: Ayampi ubhato koṭiko pañho tavānuppatto, so tayā nibbāhitabbo”ti.
analyzed: ayam pi ubhatas koṭikaḥ pañho tava anuppatto saḥ tayā nibbāhitabbaḥ ti

original: “Bhāsitampetaṁ, mahārāja, bhagavatā—
analyzed: mahā rāja bhagavatā

original: ‘tathāgatappavedito, bhikkhave, dhammavinayo vivaṭo virocati no paṭicchanno’ti.
analyzed: tathāgata ppaveditaḥ bhikkhave dhamma vinayaḥ vivaṭaḥ virocati no paṭicchannaḥ ti

original: Puna ca pātimokkhuddeso kevalañca vinayapiṭakaṁ pihitaṁ paṭicchannaṁ, tañca pana na sabbesaṁ, sīmaṁ katvā pihitaṁ.
analyzed: puna ca pātimokkha uddeso kevalam ca vinaya piṭakam pihitam tat ca pana na sabbesa sīmam katvā pihita

original: Tividhena, mahārāja, bhagavatā pātimokkhuddeso sīmaṁ katvā pihito, pubbakānaṁ tathāgatānaṁ
analyzed: tividhena mahā rāja bhagavatā pātimokkha uddesaḥ sīmam katvā pihitaḥ pubbakānam tathāgatāna

original: vaṁsavasena pātimokkhuddeso sīmaṁ katvā pihito, dhammassa garukattā pihito, bhikkhubhūmiyā garukattā pihito.
analyzed: vasa vasena pātimokkha uddesaḥ sīmam katvā pihitaḥ dhammassa garukattā pihitaḥ bhikkhu bhūmiyā garukattā pihitaḥ

original: Kathaṁ pubbakānaṁ tathāgatānaṁ vaṁsavasena pātimokkhuddeso sīmaṁ katvā pihito?
analyzed: katham pubbakānam tathāgatānam vasa vasena pātimokkha uddesaḥ sīmam katvā pihitaḥ

original: Eso vaṁso, mahārāja, sabbesaṁ pubbakānaṁ tathāgatānaṁ yadidaṁ bhikkhumajjhe pātimokkhuddeso avasesānaṁ pihito.
analyzed: esaḥ vaso mahā rāja sabbesam pubbakānam tathāgatānam yat idam bhikkhu majjhe pātimokkha uddesaḥ avasesānam pihitaḥ

original: Yathā, mahārāja, khattiyānaṁ khattiyamāyā khattiyesuyeva carati, evametaṁ khattiyānaṁ lokassa paveṇī avasesānaṁ pihitā;
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja khattiyānam khattiya māyā khattiyesu yeva carati evam etam khattiyānam lokassa paveṇī avasesānam pihitā

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, eso vaṁso sabbesaṁ pubbakānaṁ tathāgatānaṁ yadidaṁ bhikkhumajjhe pātimokkhuddeso avasesānaṁ pihito.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja esaḥ vaso sabbesam pubbakānam tathāgatānam yat idam bhikkhu majjhe pātimokkha uddesaḥ avasesānam pihitaḥ

original: Yathā vā pana, mahārāja, mahiyā gaṇā vattanti, seyyathidaṁ—
analyzed: yathā vā pana mahā rāja mahiyāḥ gaṇāḥ vattanti

original: mallā atoṇā pabbatā dhammagiriyā brahmagiriyā naṭakā naccakā laṅghakā pisācā maṇibhaddā
analyzed: mallāḥ atoṇāḥ pabbatāḥ dhammagiriyāḥ brahmagiriyāḥ naṭakāḥ naccakāḥ laṅghakāḥ pisācāḥ maṇibhaddā

original: puṇṇabaddhā candimasūriyā siridevatā kālidevatā, sivā vasudevā ghanikā asipāsā bhaddiputtāti,
analyzed: puṇṇabaddhā candimasūriyā siridevatā kālidevatā sivā vasudevā ghanikā asipāsā bhaddiputtā ati

original: tesaṁ tesaṁ rahassaṁ tesu tesu gaṇesuyeva carati, avasesānaṁ pihitaṁ;
analyzed: tesam tesam rahassam tesu tesu gaṇesu yeva carati avasesānam

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, eso vaṁso sabbesaṁ pubbakānaṁ tathāgatānaṁ yadidaṁ bhikkhumajjhe pātimokkhuddeso avasesānaṁ pihito.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja esaḥ vaso sabbesam pubbakānam tathāgatānam yat idam bhikkhu majjhe pātimokkha uddesaḥ avasesānam pihitaḥ

original: Evaṁ pubbakānaṁ tathāgatānaṁ vaṁsavasena pātimokkhuddeso sīmaṁ katvā pihito.
analyzed: evam pubbakānam tathāgatānam vasa vasena pātimokkha uddesaḥ sīmam katvā pihitaḥ

original: Kathaṁ dhammassa garukattā pātimokkhuddeso sīmaṁ katvā pihito?
analyzed: katham dhammassa garuka ttā pātimokkha uddesaḥ sīmam katvā pihitaḥ

original: Dhammo, mahārāja, garuko bhāriyo, tattha sammattakārī aññaṁ ārādheti, taṁ tattha
analyzed: dhammaḥ mahā rāja garukaḥ bhāriyaḥ tattha sammatta kārī aññam ārādheti tam tattha

original: paramparāsammattakāritāya pāpuṇāti, na taṁ tattha paramparāsammattakāritāya pāpuṇāti,
analyzed: paramparā sammatta kāritāya pāpuṇāti na tam tattha paramparā sammatta kāritāya pāpuṇāti

original: mā cāyaṁ sāradhammo varadhammo asammattakārīnaṁ hatthagato oññāto avaññāto hīḷito
analyzed: mā ca ayam sāra dhammaḥ vara dhammaḥ a sammatta kārīnam hattha gataḥ oññātaḥ avaññātaḥ hīḷito

original: khīḷito garahito bhavatu, mā cāyaṁ sāradhammo varadhammo dujjanagato oññāto avaññāto
analyzed: khīḷitaḥ gara hitaḥ bhavatu mā ca ayam sāra dhammaḥ vara dhammaḥ dujjana gataḥ oññātaḥ avaññātaḥ

original: hīḷito khīḷito garahito bhavatūti.
analyzed: hīḍitaḥ khīḍitaḥ gara hitaḥ bhavatu uti

original: Evaṁ dhammassa garukattā pātimokkhuddeso sīmaṁ katvā pihito.
analyzed: evam dhammassa garuka ttā pātimokkha uddesaḥ sīmam katvā pihitaḥ

original: Yathā, mahārāja, sāravarapavaraabhijātajātimantarattalohitacandanaṁ nāma savarapuramanugataṁ oññātaṁ avaññātaṁ hīḷitaṁ khīḷitaṁ garahitaṁ bhavati;
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja sāravara pavara abhijāta jātimanta rattalohitacandanam nāma sa vara puram anugatam oññātam avaññātam hīḷitam khīḍitam garahitam bhavati

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, mā cāyaṁ sāradhammo varadhammo paramparāasammattakārīnaṁ hatthagato
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja mā ca ayam sāra dhammaḥ vara dhammaḥ paramparā asammatta kārīnam hattha gataḥ

original: oññāto avaññāto hīḷito khīḷito garahito bhavatu, mā cāyaṁ sāradhammo varadhammo dujjanagato
analyzed: oññātaḥ avaññātaḥ hīḷitaḥ khīḍitaḥ gara hitaḥ bhavatu mā ca ayam sāra dhammaḥ vara dhammaḥ dujjana gataḥ

original: oññāto avaññāto hīḷito khīḷito garahito bhavatūti.
analyzed: oññātaḥ avaññātaḥ hīḷitaḥ khīḷitaḥ garahitaḥ bhavatu uti

original: Evaṁ dhammassa garukattā pātimokkhuddeso sīmaṁ katvā pihito.
analyzed: evam dhammassa garuka ttā pātimokkha uddesaḥ sīmam katvā pihitaḥ

original: Kathaṁ bhikkhubhūmiyā garukattā pātimokkhuddeso sīmaṁ katvā pihito?
analyzed: katham bhikkhu bhūmiyā garuka ttā pātimokkha uddesaḥ sīmam katvā pihitaḥ

original: Bhikkhubhāvo kho, mahārāja, loke atuliyo appamāṇo anagghiyo, na sakkā kenaci agghāpetuṁ
analyzed: bhikkhu bhāvaḥ kho mahā rāja loke atuliyaḥ appamāṇaḥ anagghiyaḥ na sakkā kenacid agghāpetu

original: tuletuṁ parimetuṁ, māyaṁ evarūpe bhikkhubhāve ṭhito lokena samasamo bhavatūti bhikkhūnaṁyeva
analyzed: tuletum parimetu mā ayam evarūpe bhikkhu bhāve ṭhitaḥ lokena samasamaḥ bhavatu uti bhikkhūnayā iva

original: antare pātimokkhuddeso carati.
analyzed: antare pātimokkha uddeso carati

original: Yathā, mahārāja, loke varapavarabhaṇḍaṁ vatthaṁ vā attharaṇaṁ vā gajaturaṅgarathasuvaṇṇarajatamaṇimuttāitthiratanādīni vā vijitakammasūrā vā sabbe te rājānamupagacchanti;
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja loke vara pavara bhaṇḍam vattham vā attharaṇam vā gaja turaṅga ratha suvaṇṇa rajata maṇi muttā aitthi ratana ādīni vā vijita kamma sūrāḥ vā sabbe te rājānam upagacchanti

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yāvatā loke sugatāgamapariyattiācārasaṁyamasīlasaṁvaraguṇā, sabbe te bhikkhusaṅghamupagatā bhavanti.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja yāvatā loke sugata āgama pariyatti ācāra sayama sīla savara guṇā sabbe te bhikkhu saṅgham upagatāḥ bhavanti

original: Evaṁ bhikkhubhūmiyā garukattā pātimokkhuddeso sīmaṁ katvā pihito”ti.
analyzed: evam bhikkhu bhūmiyā garuka ttā pātimokkha uddesaḥ sīmam katvā pihitaḥ ti

original: “Sādhu, bhante nāgasena, evametaṁ tathā sampaṭicchāmī”ti.
analyzed: sādhu bhante nāgasena evam etam tathā sampaṭicchāmi iti

original: Dhammavinayapaṭicchannāpaṭicchannapañho dutiyo.
analyzed: dhamma vinaya paṭicchanna apaṭicchanna pañhaḥ dutiyaḥ
